table_description: Details of package versions, including version, size, digest, and download count.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the package version.

columns.name: name
columns.description: name and version of the package

columns.name: createdAt
columns.description: Timestamp when the package version was created.

columns.name: updatedAt
columns.description: Timestamp when the package version was last updated.
